title: MorganaX
author: MorganaX
content: Please I’ll like the forum members to enlighten me concerning bitcoins and make some links available for me to understand bitcoins and other cryptocurrencies

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: Hi there,I would recommend these website/book as starting pointhttps://github.com/bitcoinbook/bitcoinbookhttps://learnmeabitcoin.com/In case you have specific question, you might find the answer either on https://bitcoin.stackexchange.com/ or this forum. You could use https://ninjastic.space/search to perform search on this forum, which is IMO better than default search function on this forum.Make your self busy if you really want to learn about bitcoin. disregard all stories you hear about people making money from bitcoin and Understand that bitcoin is not a get rich quick scheme so learning should be your focus as a newbie.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: MorganaX on December 09, 2023, 10:03:31 AMPlease I’ll like the forum members to enlighten me concerning bitcoins and make some links available for me to understand bitcoins and other cryptocurrencies I will suggest you start reading information from the forum. The forum has enough materials about Bitcoin that can enlighten any newbie. You should also consider reading the Bitcoin Whitepaper to enable you to get a foundation knowledge about Bitcoin. Andreas Antonopoulos is a good educator on Bitcoin, his educational books and videos will be helpful in your path to learn about Bitcoin. His book Mastering Bitcoin: Programming the Open Blockchain can be downloaded freely on some websites. Also, the internet is filled with information on the crypto space, do your research. But ensure you verify the information you get from reliable sources. If you have any relevant questions, you can ask them in the forum and you will quality answers.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk. There are lots of solid materials here to get you started on your crypto journey. May I suggest you start with the pinned threads on this board. If you get tired of reading and want to watch videos. I recommend you visit  Andreas Antonopoulos YouTube channel. He is one of the few people out there with useful content. His book “ Mastering Bitcoin” is also a good place to start. Quote from: MorganaX on December 09, 2023, 05:14:23 PMI’ll like to ask if this platform is all about bitcoins and it’s advantages, uses to us and it’s help financially This is a bitcoin forum. The primary reason this forum was created was/is for bitcoin enthusiasts and developers to share their ideas and opinions on the project. The forum has evolved from when it first started, there’s been several changes to the forum. Signature campaigns, art contests amongst others are ways members can earn here. If I were you, I wouldn’t think too much about the financial benefits of the forum for now, the currency you can earn on the forum is Bitcoin. You need to first learn how Bitcoin works before you can make a living off it.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Quote from: MorganaX on December 09, 2023, 05:14:23 PMThanks but I’ll like to ask if this platform is all about bitcoins and it’s advantages, uses to us and it’s help financially Welcome to the forum!This platform is indeed a great place to learn about Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. It’s not just about the financial aspect, but also about understanding the technology behind it, the blockchain. Bitcoin, as the first cryptocurrency, has paved the way for a new kind of financial system, one that operates independently of traditional banking structures. It offers a decentralized system, meaning no single entity has control over the entire network. It provides a level of transparency that isn’t typically found in traditional financial systems, and it can be a hedge against inflation in certain economies. The value of Bitcoin can be quite volatile, and it’s possible to lose your investment. That’s why it’s crucial to do your research and understand what you’re investing in. Happy learning!
